body.p: The HP Helion OpenStack deployment requires several JSON files.

section.p:
Edit the node-provision.json file to change only the following fields:
Field Description
Pxe-mac-address MAC address of the interface you want to PXE boot onto. This is not same as iLO MAC address.
pm_ip Power management IP (iLO ip)
pm_user Power management user (iLO username)
pm_pass Power management password (iLO password)
failure_zone, vendor, model, os_partition_size, data_partition_size Enter the same value as for these fields an in the nodes.json file used during cloud deployment
To see a sample node-provision.json file, seeSample JSON File for the HLM Virtual Machine Installation.

Modify the environment.json file to configure the VLANs and network addresses as appropriate for your environment. Set the following for the CLM, CAN, and BLS network:"cidr": "start-address": The three controller nodes should have CLM, CAN, EXT, BLS on eth0 and TUL on eth1.

ol.li: Set the number of compute systems to 2. "count": 2, //number of computes in the resource pool
Update the ansible-vars section with all the information based on your setup.
